profile:
Stannah is recognized around the world as the company that brings freedom, independence and a strong sense of safety back to anyone who has difficulty overcoming the challenges posed by the stairs in their home. Indoors and outdoors, around the world there are more Stannah stairlifts in place than any other brand.

Ever since Stannah was established as a family-owned company almost 150 years ago, we have been committed to quality craftsmanship. Safety, reliability, and value are the tools of our trade, while you, our customer, are our primary focus. We want you to understand and enjoy freedom, independence and the inescapable feeling of pride that comes from being the master of your home.
products: Stairlifts, Stair Lifts, Chairlifts, Chair Lifts, Stairglides, Stair Glides, Stair Chair
services: Sales, Service, Installation of Stannah Stairlifts
name: Stannah

profile:
Total Access Solutions provides all that you need to stay independent. With over 30 years of experience, we have the creativity and the know-how to help you find a barrier-free solution that works for you and your family.  

We understand that your needs are unique to you, and we are committed to providing the most cost-effective, quality, safe products, custom designed to ensure you receive the solution best suited for you.

Our core value is to be your one-stop location for all your accessibility needs, our company provides a unique collection of accessible modifications including, wheelchair ramps, chair lifts, grab bar installation, accessible door openers, overhead ceiling lift systems, vehicle lifts and more. We would be happy to provide you with a free in-home assessment.
name: Total Access Solutions ltd

profile:
Mobility Specialists has quickly become a trusted provider of wheelchair ramps, lifts, and other mobility products for families, businesses, government agencies, and health practitioners across the GTA.

Our success rests on our commitment to customer satisfaction and safety. We take the time to understand our clients and provide friendly, personalized service and expert advice. We love knowing that we’re making a real difference in people’s lives.
